name: decide_strategy
description: decide approach by capturing assumptions and decision criteria
instructions: - For each assumption, state whether you accept it or propose a modification. Provide justification based on the context.
- For each strategic decision, select the most appropriate option from the available choices.
- Explain your reasoning based on context.
Present your analysis to the user for review.
If context is insufficient to make a decision, state: "[!] NOT ENOUGH INFORMATION" and ask user for guidance.
After presenting all assumptions and decisions, ask the user to review and confirm or provide corrections.
**To save decisions:** When user confirms, pass decisions as parameters to the next action you run.
The system will automatically save the decisions to strategy.json and proceed with the next action.
